item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ross Ulbricht granted a full pardon (550 points | 630 comments)
2. Stargate Project: SoftBank, OpenAI, Oracle, MGX to build data centers (485 points | 528 comments)
3. 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms (1080 points | 360 comments)
4. Moving on from React, a year later (60 points | 19 comments)
5. Hunyuan3D 2.0 – High-Resolution 3D Assets Generation (131 points | 54 comments)
6. Isolating complexity is the essence of successful abstractions (35 points | 2 comments)
7. Infinigen (17 points | discuss)
8. What are these bumps on the top of a pull-tab can? (61 points | 2 comments)
9. Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M plant (1996) (302 points | 157 comments)
10. Why is zero plural? (2024) (28 points | 49 comments)
11. Tensor Product Attention Is All You Need (9 points | 5 comments)
12. Calm tech certification "rewards" less distracting tech (221 points | 62 comments)
13. Open-source browser port of Pitfall from the Atari 2600 (32 points | 8 comments)
14. Castle Game Engine: Web target – big progress, first 3 demos to try (55 points | 10 comments)
15. Evo: Version control that works the way you think (13 points | 13 comments)
16. Ask HN: Is anyone doing anything cool with tiny language models? (299 points | 140 comments)

18. The Peppermills of Jens Quistgaard (59 points | 35 comments)
19. JReleaser: quick and effortless way to release your project (62 points | 18 comments)
20. Rafael Araujo's 20 Mesmerizing Geometrical Masterpieces (2024) (92 points | 11 comments)
21. HyperDX (YC S22) is hiring engineers to build open source observability ( | hide)
22. Sigstore: Making sure your software is what it claims to be (58 points | 18 comments)
23. Dissecting "Tiny Clouds" shadertoy (2017) (20 points | discuss)
24. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (115 points | 69 comments)
25. Ask HN: Songwriters, what software do you use? (27 points | 33 comments)
26. Liskov Substitution: The real meaning of inheritance (33 points | 27 comments)
27. Concept cells help your brain abstract information and build memories (89 points | 7 comments)
28. Show HN: I made a app that uses NFC as a physical switch to block distractions (151 points | 91 comments)
29. More than 40% of postdocs leave academia, study reveals (160 points | 188 comments)
30. Guided by the beauty of our test suite (88 points | 9 comments)
